dt.t: Although hostile, he preserved an {wi}appearance{/wi} of neutrality.

dt: {bc}a sense impression or aspect of a thing

dt.t: The blue of distant hills is only an {wi}appearance{/wi}.
the first {wi}appearance{/wi} of that word in English

dt: {bc}the presentation of oneself in court as a party to an action often through the representation of an attorney

dt.t: her first public {wi}appearance{/wi} since winning the award

et: re-formation (after {et_link|appear|appear}) of Middle English {it}apparence, aparaunce,{/it} borrowed from Anglo-French {it}apparaunce, apparence,{/it} borrowed from Late Latin {it}appārentia,{/it} noun derivative of Latin {it}appārent-, appārens,{/it} present participle of {it}appārēre{/it} "to be visible, {et_link|appear|appear}"

dt: {bc}the formal act of going in front of judge to have one's case decided

dt.t: One man has been convicted of the crime, and two others are awaiting {it}court appearances{/it}.

shortdef: the formal act of going in front of judge to have one's case decided

dt: {bc}to seem to have a quality or characteristic because of appearance {bc}seem to be

dt.t: The playground {it}gives every appearance of{/it} being a safe place for children, but a tragic accident occurred there recently.

shortdef: to seem to have a quality or characteristic because of appearance : seem to be

dt.t: His white beard {it}gave him the appearance of{/it} an old man.
He'll be making a special {it}guest appearance{/it} on the popular television show next fall.

shortdef: appearing or performing as a guest

dt: {bc}to seem to be (something) according to appearance yet not necessarily so in reality

dt.t: The furniture {it}has the appearance{/it} of being made by hand.

shortdef: to seem to be (something) according to appearance yet not necessarily so in reality

dt.t: He is still very youthful {it}in appearance{/it}.

dt: {bc}to go to an event, gathering, etc., usually for a short period of time

dt.t: The candidate {it}made an appearance{/it} at the rally.

shortdef: to go to an event, gathering, etc., usually for a short period of time

dt.t: He's very proud of his {it}physical appearance{/it}.

dt: {bc}to go to an event, gathering, etc., usually for a short period of time

dt.t: I won't be able to stay at the party long, but I'll at least try to {it}put in an appearance{/it}.

shortdef: to go to an event, gathering, etc., usually for a short period of time
